wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Lucas Duerden (1898-1969) was an English cathedral organist, who served in Blackburn Cathedral.

response: Since 2019 the organist and director of music has been John Robinson. Previous organists have included Richard Henry Coleman, Charles Hylton Stewart, Herman Brearley, Thomas Lucas Duerden, John Bertalot, David Anthony Cooper, Gordon Stewart and Richard Tanner.
* Thomas Lucas Duerden (1898–1969), an English cathedral organist
